text: Eṉiṉum, avarkaḷ taṅkaḷ aṟivāl terintu koḷḷa muṭiyātataiyum, (nikaḻumeṉa) atil kūṟappaṭṭavai nikaḻātirukkaiyil avaṟṟaiyum (atil kūṟappaṭṭa maṟṟavaṟṟaiyum) poyyeṉa avarkaḷ kūṟukiṉṟaṉar.Ivarkaḷukku muṉṉiruntavarkaḷum ivvāṟē (taṅkaḷ aṟivukku eṭṭātataiyum, tāṅkaḷ kāṇātataiyum) poyyeṉak kūṟikkoṇṭiruntaṉar. Ākavē, anta aniyāyakkārarkaḷiṉ muṭivu eppaṭi muṭintatu eṉpatai (napiyē!) Kavaṉippīrāka
